text: Mike Nacua (born June 14, 1973), better known as Pekto, is a Filipino actor, comedian and television host.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fzXBtMC-b94 ==Career== Born and raised in the province of Cebu, Mike "Pekto" Nacua was discovered by GMA Network in 2003 as an actor and comedian. He started his career as an stand-up comedian on their TV shows and films. He is most notable for his role in Etheria as Banak in 2005. In 2012, he was cast in My Daddy Dearest as Marco and the following year, became part of the cast of Ismol Family playing the role of Bobong. ==Filmography== ===Television=== {| class="wikitable" |- !
